name: Chiikawa Flower Fortune-telling Gummy 1BOX 10 bags
description:
Image of an impressive scene appearing in "Chiikawa"! In the story of Chiikawa, the "like" and "dislike" when taking flower fortune-telling petals are "Iya..." "Wai..."!
The small petal gummies and the gummies of Chiikawa are included, and you can enjoy healing gummies by taking them out of the bag and playing flower fortune-telling or lining them up.
The peach-flavored small gummies come in a large 60g package! They are in a package with a check, allowing you to eat them little by little while walking.

Size (approx.): H155×W105
Contents: Gummies 60g
Weight (approx.): 63g
Manufacturing location: Japan

name: Chiikawa Chocolat (Pink)
description: That popular illustrator, Nagano-san, has created a design featuring an illustration drawn exclusively for Darowayo! The design is available in four variations. It's so cute that you'll undoubtedly want to collect them all.Inside, there are two types of chocolates. The bitter one has a rich flavor, and the milk one has a gentle taste.Even after eating the chocolates inside, you can use it for various purposes such as accessories or lip cream, offering versatility.It's recommended as a price range for a little self-indulgence or a small present.Size: Approximately 83.5×H30mmMaterial: Steel canManufactured in: JapanContents: 1 piece of bitter chocolate, 2 pieces of milk chocolate / Total of 3 piecesAllergen display: Milk, Soybeans*The manufacturing plant also produces products containing eggs, wheat, and peanuts.Storage method: Store below 28°C, avoiding direct sunlight.Best before: August 2022【 This item does not ship to overseas. 】

Snack time with Rakko. A giant cone with a crunchy texture and satisfying bite. Deliciousness that lingers.

Size (approx.): H180×W120×D30mm
Weight (approx.): 33g
Material: Kraft bag
Manufacturing location: Giant cone: Peru
※ Store away from direct sunlight, high temperature, and humidity, and consume as soon as possible after opening.

name: Chiikawa Chiikawa Restaurant Print Langue de Chat (12 Pieces)
description:
This is the original goods of Restaurant Chiikawa. We are selling white chocolate coated Langue de Chat from Hokkaido! The Langue de Chat, characterized by its crispy texture, comes in a set of 12 pieces. As a bonus, three types of sealed sheets are included in a box at random!
Size: Approximately H190×W195×D35mm Best before: February 1, 2025 Made in: Japan
※ At the manufacturing site of this product, we also manufacture products containing peanuts, shrimp, crab, and walnuts. ※ Please consume as soon as possible after opening. ※ Due to the manufacturing process, there may be variations in the baking color, but there are no quality issues. ※ To enjoy the crispy texture, the Langue de Chat dough is baked thinly. Therefore, it is a very fragile product, so please handle it with care. Also, if the product is broken upon delivery, we cannot accommodate returns or exchanges. ※ When the chocolate becomes hot, the oil content may melt and solidify white when cooled. Although there is no problem in consuming it, it may affect the taste. ※ This product uses edible ink for printing. During the manufacturing process, edible ink may rarely adhere to the back of the product, but please enjoy it with peace of mind.

name: Chiikawa Chiikawa Restaurant Print Langue de Chat (6 Pieces)
description:
This is the original goods of ChiikawaRestaurant.We are sandwiching white chocolate in the dough of Langue de Chat from Hokkaido!It is a Langue de Chat characterized by its crispy texture (contains 6 pieces).Bonus seals (3 types in total) are randomly sealed in one box!
[Pre-release] The release date of this product is Saturday, November 18, 2023. Please note that it will be shipped after the release date.
Size: Approx. H93×W175×D35mmBest before: May 18, 2025Manufactured in: Japan
※ At the manufacturing factory of this product, products containing peanuts, shrimp, crab, and walnuts are manufactured.※ Please consume as soon as possible after opening.※ Due to the manufacturing process, there may be irregularities in the baked color, but there are no quality issues.※ To enjoy the crispy texture, the Langue de Chat dough is baked thinly. Therefore, it is a very fragile product, so please handle with care. Also, if the product is broken upon delivery, we cannot accept returns or exchanges.※ When chocolate becomes hot, the fat content may melt and solidify white when cooled. It is safe to eat, but it is inferior in terms of flavor.※ This product uses edible ink for printing. During the manufacturing process, edible ink may rarely adhere to the back of the product, but please enjoy it with peace of mind.
